welcomeMessage:
Welcome to the Flight Price Monitor Bot! 🛫

I can help you monitor flight prices and notify you when they change.

Use /monitor to start monitoring a new flight
Use /stop to stop monitoring flights
setupMessage:
Let's set up flight monitoring! 🛫

Please send me the Google Flights URL for the flight you want to monitor.
Make sure it's a valid Google Flights search URL with your desired route and date.
invalidUrlMessage:
Please send a valid Google Flights URL.
Make sure you're copying the entire URL from your browser.
urlErrorMessage: Sorry, there was an error processing the URL. Please make sure it's a valid Google Flights URL and try again.
dateConfirmationMessage:
I found flights for ${date}.
Would you like to monitor nearby dates as well?
successMessage:
✅ Successfully set up monitoring for ${successCount} trips!
I'll notify you when the lowest price for any trip changes by 5% or more.
noSuccessMessage: Sorry, I couldn't set up monitoring for any of the dates. Please try again with a different date range.
setupErrorMessage: Sorry, there was an error setting up flight monitoring. Please make sure you're sending a valid Google Flights URL and try again.
noActiveMonitorsMessage: You don't have any active flight monitors.
noActiveMonitorsToStopMessage: You don't have any active flight monitors to stop.
stopMonitorPrompt:
Which flight monitor would you like to stop?
Select from the list below:
listErrorMessage: Sorry, there was an error retrieving your flight monitors.
noMonitorFoundMessage: Sorry, I couldn't find that flight monitor.
stopErrorMessage: Sorry, there was an error stopping the flight monitor.
settingUpMonitoringMessage: Setting up flight monitoring for ${range === 0 ? 'selected date' : `±${range} days`}...
stoppedMonitoringMessage: ✅ Stopped monitoring flights from ${trip.flights[0].origin} to ${trip.flights[0].destination} on ${trip.date}.
startingPriceCheckMessage: Starting price check for all active trips...
fetchingNewPricesMessage: Fetching new prices from Google Flights...
notifiedUserMessage: Notified user ${trip.userId} about lowest price change for trip ${trip.flights[0].origin} to ${trip.flights[0].destination} on ${trip.date}
failedToCheckPricesMessage: Failed to check prices for trip ${trip.id}:
priceAlert: Price Alert ${emoji} Route: ${origin} ✈️ ${destination} Date: ${date} ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ${trend} by: 💰 R$ ${priceChange} (${percentage}%) Previous Price: R$${oldPrice} Current Price: R$${newPrice} ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ 🔍 View on Google Flights
